name: Carnival Of Corpses
description:
Carnival of Corpses

You thought this would be a pleasant day at the Amusement Park? Well think again! This park is infested with hungry zombies, who will stop at nothing to ruin your fun! How long can you survive?

Enjoy over four custom design theme park rides, all the while killing hoards of mindless zombies. Use your weapons skillfully, as well as your allies, because these zombies won't stop coming until they've gotten you!
